Name: A Thousand Years
About the game: It's the year 1000 and the war between angels and devils for the Earth has begun. Choose your side, grow your population of humans and expand your realm. In this strategy game everything is in real time, and time is a precious resource to manage. City management Your cities will need resources to expand and sometimes managing their logistic will get quite challenging. Use resources to produce the equipment for your army and craft magic items. Auto battler Define your strategy choosing the equipment for your soldiers. You can keep them safe with shields and armors, equip them with offensive or defensive scrolls, give them potions for the worse situations. Your units will decide by themselves how to use their inventory and how to attack the enemy. Main features Auto-battle system, manage your squads and forget about micro-management. Everything is in real time! No turns, no waiting. Explore procedural maps, every game is different. Handle multiple battles at the same time. Units progression with RPG elements. Singleplayer campaign, sandbox or single mission.
